data.chText: 她因妥善处理了那个局面而受到表扬。
data.enText: She was commended on her handling of the situation.

data.chText: 他的设计受到了评委的高度赞扬。
data.enText: His designs were highly commended by the judges (= they did not get a prize but they were especially praised) .

data.chText: 她工作出色，我毫无保留地把她推荐给你。
data.enText: She is an excellent worker and I commend her to you without reservation.
The movie has little to commend it (= it has few good qualities) .
if sth commends itself to sb, they approve of it

data.chText: 他直言不讳的行为不受他同事的欢迎。
data.enText: His outspoken behaviour did not commend itself to his colleagues.
to give sb/sth to sb in order to be taken care of

data.chText: 我们把她的灵魂托付给上帝。
data.enText: We commend her soul to God.

ex.chText: 她因乐于助人而受到老师的表扬。
ex.enText: She was praised by her teacher for being ready to help others.

ex.chText: 州长称赞了他的大无畏行为。
ex.enText: The governor praised him for his act of great bravery.

ex.chText: 他为提高个税起征点的决定拍手叫好。
ex.enText: He applauded the decision to raise the income tax threshold.

ex.chText: 她的宽宏大量应当受到赞许。
ex.enText: She should be applauded for her generosity.

synonyms.bx: 指强烈赞成、认同某个想法、计划等。

ex.chText: 那位参议员因热心公益事业而受到称赞。
ex.enText: The senator was commended for his public-spirited action.
His work has been highly commended.

synonyms.bx: 词义同 praise，但多用于正式文体。

ex.chText: 我的男朋友称赞我的新耳环。
ex.enText: My boyfriend complimented me on my new earrings.

ex.chText: 甚至连他的外教也夸奖他的法语棒极了。
ex.enText: Even his foreign teacher complimented him on his excellent French.

synonyms.bx: 指说好听的话，含恭维之意，多用于 compliment sb on sth 的结构中。

ex.chText: 如果你去那家餐厅，我推荐拔丝地瓜，真的很好吃。
ex.enText: If you go to that restaurant, I recommend candied sweet potato - it's really delicious.

ex.chText: 你能推荐一位经验丰富的英语老师吗？
ex.enText: Can you recommend an experienced English teacher?

ex.chText: 她把这部电影推荐给对都铎王朝感兴趣的人。
ex.enText: She recommended this movie to anyone with an interest in the Tudors.

ex.chText: 他为什么推荐你担任董事？
ex.enText: Why did he recommend you for the directorship?

synonyms.bx: 指向别人介绍很好或很有用的事物，也指举荐某人，常用于 recommend sb/sth to sb 结构中。

ex.chText: 我们建议你咨询一下吉姆。
ex.enText: We recommend that you ask Jim for advice.

ex.chText: 如果你周五没什么事的话，我们建议你参观国家博物馆。
ex.enText: If you are free on Friday, we recommend visiting the national museum.

ex.chText: 此外，切记recommend不可后接双宾语，即不可说recommendsbsth。

tips.tip: 可以说 recommend that sb do sth 或 recommend doing sth，但不可以说 recommend sb doing。

ex.enText: This novel has much to commend it.

ex.chText: 经理向我们推荐这份报告。
ex.enText: The manager commended this report to us.

synonyms.bx: 指告诉别人某人或某物很好或值得关注。

ex.enText: He has been suggested/recommended for the post of president.

ex.chText: 你能推荐一本不错的英语词典吗？
ex.enText: Can you suggest/recommend a good English dictionary?

synonyms.bx: 指推荐可供选择的合适对象，常用于suggest sb/sth for sth 结构中，可与 recommend 换用。

tr: mention as by way of greeting or to indicate friendship

example: I commend my children to you

tr: present as worthy of regard, kindness, or confidence
example: His paintings commend him to the artistic world

value.def: If you commend someone or something, you praise them formally.

example.ex: I commended her for that action...
example.tran: 我赞扬了她的那一举动。

example.ex: I commend Ms. Orth on writing such an informative article...
example.tran: 我对奥思太太写出内容如此翔实的文章表示赞许。

example.ex: The book was widely commended for its candour...
example.tran: 这本书以其直言不讳而广受好评。
这些报道赞扬了她的勇敢。

example.ex: His actions were commended by the Jury.
example.tran: 他的所作所为受到了陪审团的赞许。

example.ex: The Company received a commendation from the Royal Society of Arts.
example.tran: 公司受到了皇家艺术协会的赞扬。

value.def: If someone commends a person or thing to you, they tell you that you will find them good or useful.

example.ex: I can commend it to him as a realistic course of action.
example.tran: 我可以把这作为一个切实可行的处理方法推荐给他。

value.def: If something commends itself to you, you approve of it.

example.ex: The Rousseau model commended itself to a lot of early socialists.
example.tran: 卢梭提出的模式被很多早期的社会主义者接受。

value.def: If you say that something has much to commend it, you approve of it. If you say that something has little to commend it, you disapprove of it.

example.ex: The Prime Minister's initiative has much to commend it.
example.tran: 首相的新方案有不少令人赞许之处。
